title: Kendall Jenner is red hot in spectacular tulle frock
text:
Kendall Jenner looks red hot as she leads a charge of bold and beautiful influencers and musicians in a stunning high-fashion campaign for H&M.

The 23-year-old reality star and model puts her legs on show in an array of outfits, including a dramatic red dress complete with train as well as a black embroidered number.

The Giambattista Valli x H&M collection which launches worldwide in select stores and online on November 7, 2019 also stars Grammy Award winning American singer H.E.R., Shameless actor Cameron Monaghan, French model Luka Isaac and Instagram personality Chiara Ferragni among others.

Red hot: Kendall Jenner, 23, stars in a new high-fashion campaign for H&M

Fierce: The model poses in a garden maze in a dramatic red dress complete with a train

Close up: The Giambattista Valli x H&M collection launches worldwide next month

Leggy lady: The 23-year-old reality star and model puts her legs on show in an array of outfits

The Valli girls and boys were shot in a variety of decadent settings in fashion designer Giambattista Valli's hometown of Rome.

Kendall raved about the collection in an interview with Harper's Bazaar this week.

'I love the dramatic yet accessible silhouettes; they make me feel powerful and effortless, which is what being fabulous is all about, in my opinion,' she told the publication.

'It's also the personal touches throughout the collection that make me really connect to the pieces. It's like wearing a little piece of Giamba himself.'

Trendsetters: Grammy Award winning American singer H.E.R. and French model Luka Isaac also feature in the campaign

Black and gold: Li Yuchun better known by her stage name Chris Lee, is a Chinese singer, songwriter, DJ and actress

Bloomin' lovely: Instagram personality Chiara Ferragni models a pink flowery frock in the shoot

'The red tulle dress I would wear with my favourite pair of heels, but could also do some flat boots,' she continued.

'The red leather trousers would be perfect with a vintage T-shirt and some sneakers. And, as for the handbags, they could go with anything really.'

The campaign images, capturing the beauty and style of the collection, are styled by Melanie Ward.

The Giambattista Valli x H&M collection launches worldwide in select stores and online at www.hm.com on November 7th 2019.

Playing it cool: Shameless star Cameron Monaghan, who plays Ian Gallagher in the Showtime series, puts his modeling skills to work

On Friday, the model was spotted in her casual attire while out in New York.

Jenner paired a grey button-up jacket with black slacks and a white t-shirt.

She wore her brunette tresses down straight with a middle part, accessorizing with chic clack shades.

Street style: The model was spotted in her casual attire while out in New York on Friday
description: Kendall Jenner looks red hot as she leads a charge of bold and beautiful influencers and musicians in a stunning high-fashion campaign for H&M.
